title: Profile
delete_note: Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted. Before deleting your account, please download any data or information that you wish to retain.
delete_confirm_text: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone. Please enter your password to confirm.
password_note: Ensure your account is using a long, random password to stay secure.
info_desc: Update your account's profile information and email address.
